title: What font please?
content:
Can someone please identify this font and guide me as to where I can get it? Your help is greatly appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Steve font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622132800/http:/typophile.com/files/Steve%20font.jpg) | 61.32 KB |
author: jonallyn

comments.content: What does "deleted erroneous post" mean? I'm looking for someone to identify the font that was used to write Steve as seen in the jpg. How do I go about this process?

Closest I could get is from Dave Rakowski, Davys Crappy Writing.  
 [http://www.fontspace.com/david-rakowski/davys-crappy-writing](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622132800/http:/www.fontspace.com/david-rakowski/davys-crappy-writing)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622132800im_/http:/typophile.com/files/steve1_4734.jpg)
Thank you so much. I'll give it a try.
